text: aur vahee hai, jisane aakaashon tatha dharatee kee utpatti chhah dinon mein kee. us samay usaka sinhaasan jal par tha, taaki tumhaaree pareeksha le ki tumamen kisaka karm sabase uttam hai. aur (he nabee!) yadi aap, unase kahen ki vaastav mein tum sabhee maran ke pashchaat punah jeevit kiye jaoge, to jo kaafir ho gaye, avashy kah denge ki ye to keval khula jaadoo hai
